comment: * A link, identifying a substring of text and possible entity types for it.

methods.name: public int getStart()
methods.comment:
* Returns the start index of this link in the original text.
         *
         * @return the start index

methods.name: public int getEnd()
methods.comment:
* Returns the end index of this link in the original text.
         *
         * @return the end index

methods.name: public int getEntityCount()
methods.comment:
* Returns the number of entity types that have confidence scores.
         *
         * @return the entity count

methods.name: public String getEntity(int index)
methods.comment:
* Returns the entity type at a given index. Entity types are sorted by confidence.
         *
         * @return the entity type at the provided index

methods.name: public float getConfidenceScore(@EntityType String entityType)
methods.comment:
* Returns the confidence score for a particular entity type.
         *
         * @param entityType the entity type

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment: * Returns a bundle containing custom data related to this TextLink.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
